caption: The Lawyer Stories Podcast Episode 187 features Lauren Klein, Founder of modern estate planning law firm + success coach for law students and new lawyers located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Lauren shares with us her journey through law school and decision to obtain her LL.M in Taxation at the University of Florida. Lauren started her career by working at a big four accounting firm and then ended up in big law. Eventually, Flourish Law Group was launched and is passionate about bringing exceptional estate planning services to Florida families, navigating the estate planning process, and advising the best ways to protect family, assets, and legacy.
